temples.name: Idaho
address: 50 W North Temple St, Salt Lake City, UT 84150, United States
email: Please visit LDS.org and sign in to email
history: Construction of the Salt Lake Temple began in 1853, but the building was not completed until 1893. The lengthy construction time was due to limited transportation for materials and a desire to make the temple perfectly beautiful and strong.
sschedule: Every hour from 6:00 AM to 7:00 PM

temples.name: Oklahoma City
address: 12030 N Mustang Rd, Yukon, OK 73099, United States
email: Please visit LDS.org and sign in to email
history: This temple was the first to be built in Oklahoma. It was dedicated in July 2000. It was then closed on October 15, 2017, for an extensive renovation project. It was rededicated in May of 2019

temples.name: Los Angeles
address: 10777 Santa Monica Blvd, Los Angeles, CA 90025, United States
email: Please visit LDS.org and sign in to email
history: This was the first temple built in California. It was dedicated in March 1956. This is one of five temples featuring an angel Moroni statue holding the gold plates

temples.name: Payson
address: 1494 S 930 W, Payson, UT 84651, United States
email: Please visit LDS.org and sign in to email
history: This temple was dedicated in June 2015. This was the fifteenth temple built in Utah and the third built in Utah County, following the Provo Utah Temple (1972) and the Mount Timpanogos Utah Temple (1996).
sschedule: Every 40 minutes from 7:00 AM to 7:40 PM
